website_summaries.verdict: Extra-thick neoprene holder to keep drinks colder for longer, available in 5 fun colors.
pros: 4mm thick Neoprene construction keeps drinks cool up to 4 hours, and will stretch to fit most cans and 12-20 oz
Easy-carry handle is large enough to hang over a stroller
Easy clean – just rinse, wipe, and hang dry
Folds to smaller size when not in use
Protects your beverages at all kinds of parties and outings, including camping trips
Bottle opener attached to exterior for convenience
cons: Some consumers didn't like the new neoprene smell when they first received this holder
Air out before use if this is a concern

customer_reviews.title: Great quality material
customer_reviews.text: Great quality material - thick and durable; reminded me of a wet suit. Beers fit nicely (snug) and the thick material seems great for keeping glass safe - even with less than 6 bottles/cans. It's also collapses nicely for storage. I plan to give this carrier as a Christmas gift to my craft beer loving father-in-law (with beer in it). I imagine he will get a lot of use out of it on his boat next summer. I also recommended this product to a new-mom friend who works full time and pumps at work.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great reusable tote for giving beer as a gift! Note that it’s not Igloo brand, though, but l’igloo. Seems a little like a trademark violation to me, but the product is still decent.
customer_reviews.author: weavelea

customer_reviews.title: Thing is a great hauler
customer_reviews.text: I really like this six-pack holder. I use swing-top bottles to bottle my own carbonated water for work and this thing is really working out well. It fits the 16oz. bottles snugly, but securely and safely so they don't smash against themselves or anything else. It will also fit cans of beer/soda/water without issue. I have been putting it in with laundry from time to time without any issue. I just keep it stocked up in the fridge and it's ready to go whenever i have to,
customer_reviews.author: Pregnant Nun

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but it doesn't fit Comotomo baby bottles so I had to return it- only reason for my purchase was to carry baby bottles to daycare. I think the issue was that the Comotomo bottles are widenecks and silicone, not hard plastic or glass, so I wasn't able to push them down into the slots. I do like that the slots are snug, would definitely keep drinks cold. Would purchase again if I ever need one for beer bottles.
customer_reviews.author: SlicG

customer_reviews.title: great option for transport
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for transporting beverages to a friends house or tailgate party. The neoprene fabric keeps the beverages cold and safe. There's no risk of the glass banging against each other. It's not going to keep beverages cold for several hours on a hot day but it will keep the cold for transport and a short time after. I think it makes a great gift for those friends who are difficult to buy for as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jrs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband actually ordered this but he is not so good at replying to messages. We really like it. He is a home brewer and takes beers to our “Brew Master” and asks his opinions about the beer. I am 59 so I guess I qualify.to give an opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Macintyre

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bottle/can carrier. My partner and I often dine at BYO restaurants and prefer beer to wine. This cooler keeps the beer cold AND you don't have to wait for a waitress to bring you a bottle opener. We're often asked about it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for air travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bottle carrier for the express purpose of keeping a six pack of beer bottles safe during air travel inside my checked luggage. It works wonderfully for this purpose, I no longer need to roll up bottles inside pair of jeans for safety.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crihfield

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a man
customer_reviews.text: Kinda feels like a scuba wet suit material. My husband carries this to his monthly poker game in the neighborhood to keep beers cold for multiple hours. The bottle opener is a great add other products like this doesn’t have; very useable feature. Very sturdy and durable. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: lauracyclegirl

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for !! Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Thia beverage carrier was more expensive than many other options on Amazon ~~ but as a seamstress, I can assure you that this is a well made item and there was no skimping on materials or workmanship. Definitely worth the price !!!
customer_reviews.author: EyeLoveGlassesTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great beverage caddy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift to use when going to restaurants that are BYOB. It appears to be very sturdy and durable and six bottle fit in perfectly. The attached bottle opener is a great addition. It has not been used to transport beverages yet, so I can't comment on how cold it keeps beverages, but based on the material, I think it will keep them cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jali

customer_reviews.title: Easier way to carry his beer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my stepdad for Christmas last Christmas and he loves it. Very portable and easy to stack his beer.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 6 pack
customer_reviews.text: THis is a great 6 pack bottle cooler. It comfortable fits all bottles, keeps them cool and hasan opener! It was 1/2 the price I saw on other sites. Makes a great fathers day or man's bday gift (I did both!)
customer_reviews.author: C Bittner

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend but when it arrived, I realized I'm going to need one for myself too! The quality and durability is great. It is small/compact enough to carry around easily but expands to handle bottles, cans or both together (which is what I did for the gift). My friend loved it and I do too!!
customer_reviews.author: STACIE D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but needs a bit of work on stitching
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the only issues I have with stitching on the edges wasn't secured enough. One edge was immediately coming apart on opening and another is coming apart now after only a couple of uses. Also, really hoping smell will go away soon.
customer_reviews.author: LilNafania

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bottle carrier!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, bottles fit nice and snug, keeps reasonably cool for a reasonable time. I use it for my beer to go very often. I keep it full in my fridge ready to go! The opener is a sweet little plus!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for someone and I am very happy with the quality. It feels well insulated and durable. I believe the person I am getting it for, will be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Mauldin

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall, I have used repeatedly to carry bottles to restaurants, golf course and even just in the car for long rides. It does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality...fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality...fast shipping! Made the perfect Christmas gift for a couple of people on my list. Seems to be made well and even though I have not personally used this item, I believe that it will work well for the recipients that received it.
customer_reviews.author: JulieMR

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beer cool and is easily transportable
customer_reviews.text: Keeps beer cool and is easily transportable. It's great for picnics. The new smell goes away after a little while or after a wash-- so I wouldn't worry about it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this present as a gift for a family member who often goes to the beach. She loved it, and especially liked that it comes with an attached bottle opener. I can't speak to durability, since I'm not the one using it, but it certainly makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for Christmas gifts. I'm sure both men will love them.

customer_reviews.title: White elephant turned keeper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a family white elephant- but I liked it so much I decided to keep it and get a different white elephant gift.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Nice and super convienent my husband loved it, and takes it whenever we go out.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my dad and he loves it. He goes on the boat alot during the summer and this will be great for his beers to stay cool. He said it was an awesome and very thoughtful gift!

customer_reviews.title: This 6 pack cooler is very nice. I bought as a gift for a friend ...
customer_reviews.text: This 6 pack cooler is very nice. I bought as a gift for a friend and put heat transfer vinyl on it. It turned out very cute.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but smells awful.
customer_reviews.text: Works great but smells awful. We have washed it several times and the out of the box smell is still ever present.

customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, I just wish it were a little taller to keep the tops of the bottles better separated.

customer_reviews.title: Love this 6-pack cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this 6-pack cooler! Great for on the go and to keep drinks cold. Material is good quality and I love that it comes with a bottle opener too.
customer_reviews.author: John Brandmaier

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality item, especially for the price. It kept my beer cold for about 4 hours. Haven't tried anything longer than that. But I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Salk

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t get to use this product as I gave it as a gift but she was very happy with it

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy his again
customer_reviews.text: Great little travel buddy, kept my 6 bottles of water nice and cool during some hi temps recently. I would recommend this to anybody that is doing a day hike, picnic or heading to a buddies house for the game.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to carry bottles and keep them cool
customer_reviews.text: Great way to carry bottles and keep them cool. Also works as a nice gift - - just add bottles and wrap in a box!

customer_reviews.title: Smell Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these so that I can fill them with the holiday variety pack of Sam Adams from Costco. Before I even received the package, I received an email explaining how to wash them. I found that odd until I opened the packages. After sitting them outside in the breeze and spraying them with Frebreeze repeatedly, I cannot get the horrible smell out of these things. Because they are gifts, I would like for them to look new and don't want to wash them. This is day four of them being aired outside. I may have to throw in the towel and wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B

product_meta.title: Vettore Sac al Fresco Neoprene 6 Pack Bottle Carrier Extra Thick Insulated Bottle Holder Keeps Drinks Cold Six Pack Beer Cooler or Baby Bottle Tote Bag or Beer Gift (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:blackOur 6 pack bottle carrier is perfect for keeping your drinks cold. At over 4 mm thick, it's thicker than most brands on the market, and there's plenty of room to stretch around those bigger bottles. It's also ideal for keeping baby bottles warm or cold. Bring your favorite beer to the party, or keep it near you while you're at a BBQ. It's great for camping as well. Throw in your favorite six pack and you'll have easy access whenever you want a cold one. Easy to clean, either wipe with a wet cloth and hang to dry, or throw it in the washer. Always air dry your 6 pack carrier. Our carrier is meant to be used over and over. 

Additional Features: 

High quality construction that stretches to fit most 12 oz beer bottles. 
Drinks well protected by extra thick neoprene. 
Discrete black color with a touch of style. 
Stays upright and holds shape to prevent drinks from tipping over. 
Made of the wetsuit material, neoprene, which is vinyl and PVC free! 
Great for holding baby bottles, water bottles, beer bottles or sodas. 

Uses: 

Beer bottle carrier 
Baby bottle carrier 
daycare bag 
tailgating gift 
Soda carrier 
Sports drink carrier 
Juice box carrier 
Coffee can holder (keep them cold or hot) 

Our bottle carrier is great for just about anything you can stuff into it. It can keep drinks cool and contain any unwanted condensation. It can also be used to keep those coffee cans warm or cold. It's discreet and stylish, so you can bring it just about anywhere and go unnoticed.
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT: Our 6 pack bottle carrier is built to last and is ideal for transporting your drinks. It will keep your items safe and cool. The easy to carry handle can also be used to hang on a stroller. It's a discreet way to transport your drinks and keep them well protected from bumps.
NEOPRENE: Made from the same non toxic, flexible material used in wetsuits. At over 4 mm thick it can keep drinks cool up to 4 hours, and will stretch to fit most cans and 12 - 20 ounce bottles.
EASY TO CLEAN: Most liquids will not be absorbed by neoprene, so when you're done just rinse, wipe and hang to dry. When not in use, it folds to 11 x 11 x 0.75 inches for easy storage.
PERFECT GIFT: Fill it up with your favorite craft beer and give it to a friend. It's the 6-pack cooler every guy should have and it makes a great beer gift. Also great as a BYO or BYOB bottle bag.
USAGE: Use it to take your favorite beer to a party or BBQ, take it camping, on a road trip, throw in some sodas for the soccer game, or us it to carry baby bottles when your on the go.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
